original: de ltar rtogs pa'i sgrub byed min //

translated: If subtlety is dependent on one thing being observed and another not being observed, then just as the object to be observed is subtle, so too is the observer. Therefore, the observation of fire does not negate the observation of smoke.

translated: If it were not so,üîΩThen, since one sees that lustful men

analyzed: de'o snyam pa ni lkog tu gyur pa'i rnam pa yin gyi mthong ba'i rnam pa ni ma yin no //

analyzed: des na rtogs pa gnyis phan tshun mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i phyir yul gcig pa nyid ma yin gyi /

original: snang ba tha dad pa ni tha dad par byed pa yin pa'i phyir te /üîΩde tha dad par byed pa nyid ma yin na ni tha snyad pa med par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: ci ste don bya ba tha dad pa yin gyi snang ba tha dad pas ni ma yin no zhe na /

original: ma yin te /

analyzed: snang ba tha dad pas tha dad pa'i don bya ba byed pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: don bya ba'i khyad par can gyi snang ba tha dad pa las yin no zhe na /

analyzed: de la rnam rtog skye bar 'gyur //

original: des na dbang skyes 'dod pa yis //
analyzed: des na dbang skyes 'dod pa yis //

original: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: sgra'i rnam pa nyid ni 'dod pa la rag las pa yin pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: mngon sum rtog pa dang bcas pa yin no //

analyzed: tha snyad ni de lta bu nyid yin te /

original: gnas pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis tshogs pa dag gi stobs kyis bskyed pa yin no //
analyzed: gnas pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis tshogs pa dag gi stobs kyis bskyed pa yin no //
translated: It is produced by the power of the collection of the eye and so on, which are the bases of the eye consciousness and so on.

original: ji ltar rang gi ngo bo'i tshogs pa las byung ba las brten pa can gyi rang bzhin dang 'brel pa can du 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: ji ltar rang gi ngo bo'i tshogs pa las byung ba las brten pa can gyi rang bzhin dang 'brel pa can du 'gyur ba yin /
translated: How could it be that the eye consciousness and so on, which arise from the collection of their own entities, are related to a nature that is dependent on other things?

original: sbyor ba ni phyi rol la mi ltos par brda dran pa'i stobs las byung ba yin la /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni phyi rol la mi ltos par brda dran pa'i stobs las byung ba yin la /
translated: The connection is produced by the power of remembering the sign without depending on external things.

original: dbang po'i shes pa ni brda la mi ltos par phyi rol la ltos pas yin no //
analyzed: dbang po'i shes pa ni brda la mi ltos par phyi rol la ltos pas yin no //
translated: The sense consciousnesses arise in dependence on external things without depending on signs.

original: de la ni rtog pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de la ni rtog pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: In that case, there is no conception,

original: rtog pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtog pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no cause of conception.

original: rgyu med par 'bras bu 'byung ba ni med do //
analyzed: rgyu med par 'bras bu 'byung ba ni med do //
translated: It is not the case that an effect arises without a cause.

original: 'on te sgra dang spyi la sogs pa dang 'brel pa'i phyi rol gyi mthus bskyed pas na dbang po'i rnam par shes pa rtog pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te sgra dang spyi la sogs pa dang 'brel pa'i phyi rol gyi mthus bskyed pas na dbang po'i rnam par shes pa rtog pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the sense consciousnesses are conceptual because they are generated by the power of external objects, such as sound and universals,

original: de yang mi bden te /
analyzed: de yang mi bden te /
translated: then that is not correct.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: BecauseüîΩwhatever is clearly related

original: gang zhig gang dang mngon 'brel te //
analyzed: gang zhig gang dang mngon 'brel te //
translated: to something

original: nges par de dang lhan cig tu //üîΩsnang ngo zhes ni bya ba 'di //
analyzed: nges par de dang lhan cig tu // snang ngo zhes ni bya ba 'di //

original: tshad ma'i yul du gyur pa yin //üîΩde lta yin na ni ma la sogs pa mthong ba na /
analyzed: tshad ma'i yul du gyur pa yin // de lta yin na ni ma la sogs pa mthong ba na /

original: 'brel pa thams cad snang bar thal lo //
analyzed: 'brel pa thams cad snang bar thal lo //
translated: If that were the case, then when one sees a mother, for example, it would follow that all of her relations would be perceived.

original: 'on te gang zhig gang la gnas pa spyi la sogs pa de ni de snang ba na kho na'o snyam na /
analyzed: 'on te gang zhig gang la gnas pa spyi la sogs pa de ni de snang ba na kho na'o snyam na /
translated: But if you think that a universal, which is located in something, is perceived only when that is perceived,

original: de yang mi bden te /
analyzed: de yang mi bden te /
translated: that is not correct.

original: sgra mi 'dzin par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra mi 'dzin par thal ba'i phyir ro //

original: snam bu la sogs pa la sgra ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: snam bu la sogs pa la sgra ni yod pa ma yin no //

original: de lta ma yin na ni brda ma bzung ba la yang snam bu snyam pa'i shes pa 'byung bar gyur na /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ni brda ma bzung ba la yang snam bu snyam pa'i shes pa 'byung bar gyur na /

original: yod pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa yang ma yin no //

original: brjod par bya ba nyid la the tshom za bar mthong ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba nyid la the tshom za bar mthong ba'i phyir te /

original: don de grub kyang rjod par byed pa'i bye brag ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don de grub kyang rjod par byed pa'i bye brag ma nges pa'i phyir ro //

original: spyi'i rnam pa nyid du ni nges pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: spyi'i rnam pa nyid du ni nges pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: But it is ascertained in the form of a universal.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /

original: dang po mthong ba la med pa'i phyir dang / de las tha dad pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dang po mthong ba la med pa'i phyir dang / de las tha dad pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not exist in the first perception, and because it is understood that it is not different from that.

original: @254b ci ste yang 'di ba lang ngo snyam pa la sogs pa'i shes pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i dbang po'i lhan cig byed pa can gyi gzugs la sogs pa nyid kyis brda dran pa la ltos nas skyed par byed pa yin no //

original: ma ltos par ni ma yin te /

original: 'bras bu'i tshogs pa las 'grub pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i tshogs pa las 'grub pa yin pa'i phyir ro //

original: gang gi tshe sgra dang spyi'am khyad par gzhan yang rung ste /
analyzed: gang gi tshe sgra dang spyi'am khyad par gzhan yang rung ste /
translated: When there is a sound, whether it is a universal or a particular,

analyzed: sngar bzung ba dran pa de'i tshe dran pa dang lhan cig pa'i mig la sogs pas skyed par byed pa yin no //
translated: When one remembers the object that was previously apprehended, the eye sense faculty and so on that are simultaneous with the memory cause the recollection of the object.

original: des na brda ma bzung ba dang / sngon mthong ba dang bral ba dag la ni mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: des na brda ma bzung ba dang / sngon mthong ba dang bral ba dag la ni mi 'gyur ro zhe na /

original: de ni legs par ma brtags pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni legs par ma brtags pa yin te /

analyzed: 'di ltar / gal te gzugs ni brda dran la // ltos nas dbang po'i blo dag la //

original: rtags bzhin dran pa nyid la 'gyur //
analyzed: rtags bzhin dran pa nyid la 'gyur //

analyzed: so sor nges pa'i dran pa'i sa bon sad par byed pa yang mthong ba med pa ma yin te /
translated: The memory of a sign does not occur without the prior experience of the sign.üîΩThe memory of a sign does not occur without the prior experience

original: des na de mthong ba ni de'i rjod par byed pa dran la /
analyzed: des na de mthong ba ni de'i rjod par byed pa dran la /
translated: Therefore, seeing it is the memory of its expression.

original: dran na ni sbyor ba yin no //
analyzed: dran na ni sbyor ba yin no //
translated: If there is memory, there is application.

original: de ltar na mthong ba la de dran na rab tu sad par byed pa'i gzugs la sogs pa ni rtags nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na mthong ba la de dran na rab tu sad par byed pa'i gzugs la sogs pa ni rtags nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, if one remembers what was seen, the form, etc. that awakens it becomes a reason.

original: des na sbyor ba'i shes pa thams cad na rtags can kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na sbyor ba'i shes pa thams cad na rtags can kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, all consciousnesses of application would be only with a reason.

original: 'on te spyi mthong ba med pa kho na yin na /
analyzed: 'on te spyi mthong ba med pa kho na yin na /
translated: But if the universal is not seen at all,

original: ji ltar rtags las rtogs par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar rtags las rtogs par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: how is it understood from a reason?

original: cha shas mtshungs pa nyid ni spyi zhes brjod pa yin la /
analyzed: cha shas mtshungs pa nyid ni spyi zhes brjod pa yin la /
translated: Sameness of part is called a universal.

original: de yang sngar dmigs pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de yang sngar dmigs pa kho na'o //
translated: And that is only previously observed.

original: des na dran par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: des na dran par bya ba yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is to be remembered.

original: cha shas de 'dra ba dang ldan pa ni /
analyzed: cha shas de 'dra ba dang ldan pa ni /
translated: That which has a similar part

original: de dang mtshungs pa'i tha snyad kyi yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dang mtshungs pa'i tha snyad kyi yul yin pa'i phyir ro //

original: cha shas rnams kyi mtshungs pa yang de 'dra ba'i cha shas mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba nas ji srid du de lta bur gyur pa'i blo mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: cha shas rnams kyi mtshungs pa yang de 'dra ba'i cha shas mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba nas ji srid du de lta bur gyur pa'i blo mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The sameness of the parts is also the sameness of the parts that are similar to that.üîΩThe cognition is also like that, because it is the apprehension of that.

original: blo yang de lta bur gyur pa'i zhen pa las yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du yin la zhen pa yang thog ma med pa'i bag chags las yin pa'i phyir skyon med do //
analyzed: blo yang de lta bur gyur pa'i zhen pa las yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du yin la zhen pa yang thog ma med pa'i bag chags las yin pa'i phyir skyon med do //
translated: And the apprehension is also without fault, because it is from beginningless latent potentialities.

original: des na sgra'am spyi la sogs pa dang sbyor ba ni rtags nyid las yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na sgra'am spyi la sogs pa dang sbyor ba ni rtags nyid las yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the application to sound, universals, and so on is just a reason.

original: 'di dran pa'i rjes su dpag pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'di dran pa'i rjes su dpag pa kho na'o //
translated: This is an inference based on memory.

original: ci ste dbang po'i byed pas sbyor ba mngon sum nyid du brjod do zhe na /üîΩde lta yin na rjes su dpag pa mtha' dag dbang po las @255a * //
analyzed: ci ste dbang po'i byed pas sbyor ba mngon sum nyid du brjod do zhe na / de lta yin na rjes su dpag pa mtha' dag dbang po las @255a * //
translated: But if you say that the application is perception because it is the activity of the sense faculty,

original: skyes pa nyid yin pa'i phyir mngon sum du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skyes pa nyid yin pa'i phyir mngon sum du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then it follows that all inferences are perception, because they are produced from the sense faculties.üîΩFor example:

original: 'di ltar / phyogs 'di na ni me'o zhes //
analyzed: 'di ltar / phyogs 'di na ni me'o zhes //
translated: Here there is fire.

original: dbang po'i byed dang ma bral bar //
analyzed: dbang po'i byed dang ma bral bar //
translated: And the sense faculty is not separated from its activity.

original: phyogs dang me ni sbyor byed pa //
analyzed: phyogs dang me ni sbyor byed pa //
translated: When the direction and fire are connected,

original: ji ltar mngon sum nyid mi 'gyur //
analyzed: ji ltar mngon sum nyid mi 'gyur //
translated: how can it not be direct perception?

original: 'on te me tsam la ni rjes su dpag pa yin la /
analyzed: 'on te me tsam la ni rjes su dpag pa yin la /
translated: If you think that it is an inference in regard to fire alone,

original: sbyor ba ni mngon sum kho na'o snyam na /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni mngon sum kho na'o snyam na /
translated: and the connection is direct perception,

original: de yang ma shes pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang ma shes pa yin no //
translated: that is also not understood.

original: gang gi phyir 'di skad kyang brjod par nus te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di skad kyang brjod par nus te /
translated: Because it can be said in this way:

original: phyogs tsam la ni mngon sum de //
analyzed: phyogs tsam la ni mngon sum de //
translated: The mere direction is direct perception.

original: sbyor ba rjes su dpag pa las //
analyzed: sbyor ba rjes su dpag pa las //
translated: The connection is from inference.

original: me la dbang po'i shes pa med //
analyzed: me la dbang po'i shes pa med //
translated: The sense faculty does not have an activity in regard to fire.

original: ma bzung ba ni sbyor ma yin //
analyzed: ma bzung ba ni sbyor ma yin //
translated: What is not apprehended is not a connection.

original: sbyor ba ni rjes su dpag pa kho na las yin par rigs te /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni rjes su dpag pa kho na las yin par rigs te /
translated: It is reasonable that the connection is only from inference,

original: me la dbang po'i byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: me la dbang po'i byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the sense faculty does not have an activity in regard to fire.

original: mngon sum gyis ma bzung ba ni des sbyor bar mi nus te /
analyzed: mngon sum gyis ma bzung ba ni des sbyor bar mi nus te /
translated: What is not apprehended by direct perception cannot be connected by it,

original: ma rtogs pa de dang ldan par rtogs so zhes bya ba ni 'gal lo //
analyzed: ma rtogs pa de dang ldan par rtogs so zhes bya ba ni 'gal lo //
translated: because it is contradictory to say that one realizes that which is not realized to be connected with that.

original: rjes su dpag pas kyang sbyor bar mi 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pas kyang sbyor bar mi 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: And is it not the case that it is not connected by inference?

original: 'di ltar / phyogs la rjes dpag 'jug ma yin //
analyzed: 'di ltar / phyogs la rjes dpag 'jug ma yin //
translated: Inference does not apply to the directions.

original: ma bzung ba ni sbyor ba med //
analyzed: ma bzung ba ni sbyor ba med //
translated: That which is not apprehended is not a logical possibility.

original: mngon sum nyid ni rjes dpag gis //
analyzed: mngon sum nyid ni rjes dpag gis //
translated: That which is directly perceived is apprehended by inference.

original: bzung ngo zhes bya bab chol yin //
analyzed: bzung ngo zhes bya bab chol yin //
translated: This is just babbling.

original: ji ltar lkog tu gyur pa'i me la mngon sum mi skye ba de bzhin du mngon sum du gyur pa'i phyogs la yang rjes su dpag pa ma yin pa'i phyir rigs pa mtshungs so //
analyzed: ji ltar lkog tu gyur pa'i me la mngon sum mi skye ba de bzhin du mngon sum du gyur pa'i phyogs la yang rjes su dpag pa ma yin pa'i phyir rigs pa mtshungs so //
translated: Just as direct perception does not arise in regard to fire that is hidden from view, in the same way, inference does not apply to directions that are directly perceived. The reasoning is similar.

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid yin na ni mngon sum ma yin te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid yin na ni mngon sum ma yin te /
translated: If something is to be inferred, it is not directly perceived.

original: tshad ma'i rnam par gzhag pa nyams par ni mi 'dod do zhe na /üîΩdon dam du ni sbyor ba nyid //
analyzed: tshad ma'i rnam par gzhag pa nyams par ni mi 'dod do zhe na / don dam du ni sbyor ba nyid //
translated: We do not accept that the presentation of valid cognitions is undermined.

original: 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te //
analyzed: 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te //
translated: In reality, there is no application at all.

original: rnam pa de lta'i rnam rtog ni //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta'i rnam rtog ni //
translated: The conceptual thought that has that form

original: gnyi ga'i de ma thag tu skye //
analyzed: gnyi ga'i de ma thag tu skye //
translated: arises immediately after either.

original: 'di na 'di'o zhes sbyor ba'i shes pa ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i rjes la byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di na 'di'o zhes sbyor ba'i shes pa ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i rjes la byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa yin no //
translated: The cognition that applies to this or that is a conceptual thought that arises after either direct perception or inference.

original: de yang thog ma med pa nas de lta bu'i tha snyad las skyes pa'i rjes su dpag pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: de yang thog ma med pa nas de lta bu'i tha snyad las skyes pa'i rjes su dpag pa nyid yin te /
translated: Moreover, it is an inference arisen from such conventions since beginningless time.

original: des na rjes su dpag pas sbyor ba tha snyad byed pa yin no //
analyzed: des na rjes su dpag pas sbyor ba tha snyad byed pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the application of inference is the use of conventions.

original: des na mngon sum gyis de ltar ma bzung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: des na mngon sum gyis de ltar ma bzung ba'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, since direct perception does not apprehend in that way,üîΩwhy is it that inference also arises as the nature of application?

original: rjes su dpag pa yang ji ltar sbyor bar byed pa'i rang bzhin du skye zhes bya ba ni skyon yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa yang ji ltar sbyor bar byed pa'i rang bzhin du skye zhes bya ba ni skyon yod pa ma yin no //
translated: This is not a fault.

original: de'i phyir mngon sum gyi sbyor ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa zhes bya bar gnas so //
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon sum gyi sbyor ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa zhes bya bar gnas so //
translated: Therefore, it is said that it is not the nature of the application of direct perception.

original: 'di ni sngar bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'di ni sngar bshad zin to //
translated: This has already been explained above.

original: ji ltar dran par bya ba lkog tu gyur pa la yang mngon sum 'jug pa nyid de /
analyzed: ji ltar dran par bya ba lkog tu gyur pa la yang mngon sum 'jug pa nyid de /
translated: Just as direct perception engages what is to be remembered, even though it is hidden,

original: des na mngon sum nyid sbyor bar byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na mngon sum nyid sbyor bar byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: therefore direct perception itself is the application.

original: de yang mi bden te /üîΩ'di ltar / der ni der 'brel skye ba'i phyir //üîΩdran las dbang blo 'gyur ba'ang yin //
analyzed: de yang mi bden te / 'di ltar / der ni der 'brel skye ba'i phyir // dran las dbang blo 'gyur ba'ang yin //
translated: That is also not correct.üîΩBecause in that case,üîΩthe sense consciousnesses would arise from memory,

original: de las dus gzhan du yang @255b 'gyur //
analyzed: de las dus gzhan du yang @255b 'gyur //
translated: and the sense consciousnesses would arise from memory.

original: la lar rnam g-yeng srid phyir ro //
analyzed: la lar rnam g-yeng srid phyir ro //
translated: and for some, because distraction is possible.

original: gal te dbang po'i blo de dran pa dang / 'brel pas dran par bya ba la skye bar 'dod na de'i tshe dbang po'i blo dran pa nyid las 'gyur te don nye ba la ltos par ni mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te dbang po'i blo de dran pa dang / 'brel pas dran par bya ba la skye bar 'dod na de'i tshe dbang po'i blo dran pa nyid las 'gyur te don nye ba la ltos par ni mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If you assert that the cognition of the sense faculty arises from memory because it is related to memory, then at that time the cognition of the sense faculty would be memory itself, and it would not depend on the presence of the object.

original: 'on te don nye ba la ltos na ni de'i tshe 'di dran pa las 'gyur ba ma yin te mngon du byed pa ni dran pa las gzhan pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'on te don nye ba la ltos na ni de'i tshe 'di dran pa las 'gyur ba ma yin te mngon du byed pa ni dran pa las gzhan pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But if it depends on the presence of the object, then at that time it would not be memory, because the actualization of the object is different from memory.

original: yang na dus gzhan du yang 'gyur te 'ga' zhig la rnam par g-yeng ba rnam par rtog pa gzhan gyi mtshan nyid de'i tshe srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na dus gzhan du yang 'gyur te 'ga' zhig la rnam par g-yeng ba rnam par rtog pa gzhan gyi mtshan nyid de'i tshe srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Or else, it would occur at another time, because it is possible that someone is distracted by something else at the time of the characteristics of another conceptual thought.

original: de'i phyir dbang po'i shes pa de yang dus gzhan du dran par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir dbang po'i shes pa de yang dus gzhan du dran par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, that cognition of the sense faculty would also be memory at another time.

original: gzhan yang gal te don de dang dbang po ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i shes pa'i rgyu yin na thams cad kyi tshe de kho na ltar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te don de dang dbang po ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i shes pa'i rgyu yin na thams cad kyi tshe de kho na ltar 'gyur te /
translated: Moreover, if the object and the sense faculty are the cause of non-conceptual cognition, then it would always be just like that.

original: des na mngon sum rnam par rtog pa med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: des na mngon sum rnam par rtog pa med pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, perception is only non-conceptual.

original: gal te rim gyis gnyis rgyu yin //üîΩtha dad med phyir sngar nyid 'gyur //
analyzed: gal te rim gyis gnyis rgyu yin // tha dad med phyir sngar nyid 'gyur //
translated: If it is the cause of both,üîΩit would be prior to both.

original: gal te 'di gnyis ka'i rgyu yin na sngar nyid gnyis ka skyed pa dang 'brel par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te 'di gnyis ka'i rgyu yin na sngar nyid gnyis ka skyed pa dang 'brel par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is the cause of both, it would be related to the production of both prior to them.

original: ci ste dran pa dang lhan cig pa'i dbang pos rnam par rtog pa dang bcas par bskyed kyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste dran pa dang lhan cig pa'i dbang pos rnam par rtog pa dang bcas par bskyed kyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But if it is claimed that the sense faculty together with memory produces the conceptual cognition, not otherwise,

original: de ni mi bden te /
analyzed: de ni mi bden te /
translated: that is not so.

original: dran pa mig dang lhan cig pa nyid du dmigs pa med do //
analyzed: dran pa mig dang lhan cig pa nyid du dmigs pa med do //
translated: Memory is not observed to be simultaneous with the eye sense faculty.

original: lhan cig pa zhes bya ba tsam gyis ni thams cad thams cad kyi lhan cig pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: lhan cig pa zhes bya ba tsam gyis ni thams cad thams cad kyi lhan cig pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Not everything is simultaneous with everything else, just because it is simultaneous.

original: 'on kyang gang zhig de ltar mthong ba de nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang gang zhig de ltar mthong ba de nyid yin no //
translated: Rather, it is only that which is seen in that way.

original: dran pas ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs par byed pa ma yin no ;
analyzed: dran pas ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs par byed pa ma yin no ;
translated: Memory does not make the eye sense faculty and so on.

original: /'on te nges pa'i rang bzhin nyid du byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: /'on te nges pa'i rang bzhin nyid du byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if it is claimed that it makes them definite,

original: de yang snying po yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang snying po yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, it does not have an essence.

original: 'di ltar / gal te rang bzhin de nges na //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gal te rang bzhin de nges na //
translated: If it is ascertained as the nature of that,

original: tha dad med phyir sngar nyid 'gyur //
analyzed: tha dad med phyir sngar nyid 'gyur //
translated: it would be just as before because it would not be different.

original: de dngos min na dbang skyes las //
analyzed: de dngos min na dbang skyes las //
translated: If it is not that entity,

original: de ni shes rab nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: de ni shes rab nyid du 'gyur //
translated: it would be just wisdom arisen from the faculty.

original: gal te sngar snang ba'i rang bzhin nyid lhag chad med par nges pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te sngar snang ba'i rang bzhin nyid lhag chad med par nges pa yin na /
translated: If it is ascertained as the nature of that which appears before without increase or decrease,

original: sngar gyi rang bzhin dang mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sngar gyi rang bzhin dang mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: it would be the same as the previous nature.

original: nges pa la ma nges pa las bla lhag med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nges pa la ma nges pa las bla lhag med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it would be superior to nonascertainment.

original: 'on te de la rang bzhin lhag pa snang ba yin na /
analyzed: 'on te de la rang bzhin lhag pa snang ba yin na /
translated: But if it appears that the nature of that is increased,

original: 'o na ni rang bzhin gzhan dang 'brel pa de shes pa gzhan nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'o na ni rang bzhin gzhan dang 'brel pa de shes pa gzhan nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: then it would be a different consciousness related to a different nature.

original: rang bzhin de la yod pa'i khyad par la sogs pa la ni dbang po'i byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin de la yod pa'i khyad par la sogs pa la ni dbang po'i byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the activity of the sense faculty does not exist in the particulars and so on that exist in that nature.

original: 'on te 'di'o zhes bya bar snang ba ni de nyid la 'jug pa yin te /
analyzed: 'on te 'di'o zhes bya bar snang ba ni de nyid la 'jug pa yin te /
translated: But if it appears as this, it engages that itself.

original: de'i phyir mngon du byed pas 'jug pa'i phyir 'di ni mngon sum nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon du byed pas 'jug pa'i phyir 'di ni mngon sum nyid do zhe na /
translated: Therefore, because it makes manifest, it is perception.üîΩThat is not so.

original: de yang mi bden te /
analyzed: de yang mi bden te /
translated: For,

original: 'di ltar / 'di'o zhes bya ba'i rnam rtog ni //
analyzed: 'di ltar / 'di'o zhes bya ba'i rnam rtog ni //
translated: The thought ‚Äúthis is that‚Äù

original: rnam rtog med pa nyid 'gyur te //üîΩdon bya sogs dang 'brel pa ni //
analyzed: rnam rtog med pa nyid 'gyur te // don bya sogs dang 'brel pa ni //
translated: would be without thought.üîΩBecause it does not think in terms of

original: snga dang phyi mar @256a * //üîΩmi rtog phyir //
analyzed: snga dang phyi mar @256a * // mi rtog phyir //
translated: prior and subsequent,üîΩit is connected with the performance of an action, etc.

original: gzugs la sogs pa nye ba tsam mngon du byed pas don byed pa la sogs pa dang 'brel par snga ma dang phyi mar 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i phyir rtog pa med pa gzhan las khyad par yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa nye ba tsam mngon du byed pas don byed pa la sogs pa dang 'brel par snga ma dang phyi mar 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i phyir rtog pa med pa gzhan las khyad par yod pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not different from the other, because it is free from the apprehension of prior and subsequent, being connected with the performance of an action, etc. by merely manifesting the mere presence of form, etc.

original: rnam par rtog par mi byed pa nyid ni rtog pa dang bcas pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog par mi byed pa nyid ni rtog pa dang bcas pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: And the mere non-performance of thought is not called ‚Äúwith thought.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir 'di'o zhes bya ba gsal ba'i rnam pa can ni dran par bya ba'i khyad par la sogs pa gsal ba'i rnam pa can ma yin pa las gzhan kho na yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di'o zhes bya ba gsal ba'i rnam pa can ni dran par bya ba'i khyad par la sogs pa gsal ba'i rnam pa can ma yin pa las gzhan kho na yin no //
translated: Therefore, the form of the thought ‚Äúthis is that‚Äù is certainly different from the form of the thought of the object to be remembered, etc.

original: de ltar ma yin dang / dbang po'i blo rgyu gzhan yin na //
analyzed: de ltar ma yin dang / dbang po'i blo rgyu gzhan yin na //
translated: If the object of the sense consciousness is different from the object of memory,

original: de la'ang dran pa yod med 'gyur //
analyzed: de la'ang dran pa yod med 'gyur //
translated: then memory would not occur with regard to that object.

original: 'on te rnam pa gsal ba can dbang po'i shes pa'i yul ni dran par bya ba'i rnam pa las gzhan yin pa nyid do snyam na /
analyzed: 'on te rnam pa gsal ba can dbang po'i shes pa'i yul ni dran par bya ba'i rnam pa las gzhan yin pa nyid do snyam na /
translated: If you think that the object of the sense consciousness, which is clear, is different from the object of memory,

original: gal te de lta na de la yang dran pa don med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te de lta na de la yang dran pa don med par 'gyur ro //
translated: then memory would be purposeless with regard to that object.

original: der 'dzin pa la ni dran pa mkho ba yod pa ma yin te dran pa med kyang de ni de ltar rtogs pa'i phyir ro //üîΩbrda dran ji ltar brdar btags pa //üîΩgrub ba'i don du 'dod ba dang // khyad par brdar btags med 'dzin //
analyzed: der 'dzin pa la ni dran pa mkho ba yod pa ma yin te dran pa med kyang de ni de ltar rtogs pa'i phyir ro // brda dran ji ltar brdar btags pa // grub ba'i don du 'dod ba dang // khyad par brdar btags med 'dzin //
translated: It is not necessary to remember in order to apprehend that object, because that object is apprehended even without memory.

original: de la dran pa don ci yod //
analyzed: de la dran pa don ci yod //
translated: What is the purpose of memory?

original: gal te dran pa dang lhan cig pa'i mig la sogs pas de'i rang bzhin du snang ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te dran pa dang lhan cig pa'i mig la sogs pas de'i rang bzhin du snang ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If you think that the eye consciousness and so on, which are simultaneous with memory, perceive the object as having the nature of memory,

original: de med na de'i rang bzhin du shes pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de med na de'i rang bzhin du shes pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: then if memory did not exist, the object would not be perceived as having the nature of memory.

original: 'di zhes bya bar snang ba mi 'gyur ba kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'di zhes bya bar snang ba mi 'gyur ba kho na'o zhe na /
translated: It is not that it does not appear as this or that.üîΩ

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: It is not so, because

original: 'di zhes bya bar snang ba med kyang de'i rang bzhin snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya bar snang ba med kyang de'i rang bzhin snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: even though there is no appearance of this, the nature of that is apparent.

original: yod kyang des ni khyad par gzhan yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir de la dgos pa ci yod /
analyzed: yod kyang des ni khyad par gzhan yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir de la dgos pa ci yod /
translated: Even if it does exist, it is not a different attribute, so what is the need for it?

original: 'jug pa la dgos so zhe na /
analyzed: 'jug pa la dgos so zhe na /
translated: If you say it is needed for engagement,

original: de med kyang 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: de med kyang 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bstan par bya'o //
translated: we will show that even without it, there is engagement.

original: de ni yid kyi mngon sum yin no zhes kyang ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni yid kyi mngon sum yin no zhes kyang ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: We will also show that it is a mental direct perception.

original: 'on te dran pa med par dang po pa goms pa dag mi ldan pa mi 'jug pa'i phyir de'i don du dran pa 'dod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te dran pa med par dang po pa goms pa dag mi ldan pa mi 'jug pa'i phyir de'i don du dran pa 'dod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the first person who is not familiar with it does not engage in it without memory, and so memory is needed for that purpose,

original: 'di la brjod pa /
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa /
translated: we reply:

original: gal te khyad par brdar btags pa med pa 'brel par ma byas pa 'dzin na /
analyzed: gal te khyad par brdar btags pa med pa 'brel par ma byas pa 'dzin na /
translated: If you apprehend it without the conventional designation of the attribute, without the connection being made,

original: de dran pas gzhan ci zhig byed par 'gyur te gang gi phyir dran pa ni 'brel par byas pa grub pa'i don du 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: de dran pas gzhan ci zhig byed par 'gyur te gang gi phyir dran pa ni 'brel par byas pa grub pa'i don du 'dod pa yin no //
translated: what else will memory do for you? For memory is asserted to be for the purpose of establishing the connection.

original: gal te de ltar ma grub na ni de rtogs pa la dran pa mkho ba med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te de ltar ma grub na ni de rtogs pa la dran pa mkho ba med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were not so, then memory would be useless for the understanding of that.

original: dang po pa'i 'jug pa ni /
analyzed: dang po pa'i 'jug pa ni /
translated: The first kind of engagement

original: tshad ma gzhan rjes su dpag pa las 'gyur ba nyid do //
analyzed: tshad ma gzhan rjes su dpag pa las 'gyur ba nyid do //
translated: is from inference based on other valid cognitions.

original: de'i phyir rnam par rtog pa ni rang gi ngo bo nyid 'dzin pa la byed pa yod pa ma yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par rtog pa ni rang gi ngo bo nyid 'dzin pa la byed pa yod pa ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, conceptual thought does not exist in the apprehension of its own nature,

original: 'jug par byed pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'jug par byed pa yang ma yin no //
translated: nor does it engage in it.

original: 'di ni dgos pa med pa yin yang goms pa las 'jug pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni dgos pa med pa yin yang goms pa las 'jug pa nyid do //
translated: Even though it is useless, it engages in it through habituation.

original: dngos po rnams dgos pa yod pa nyid kyi @256b phyir 'byung ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos po rnams dgos pa yod pa nyid kyi @256b phyir 'byung ba ni ma yin te /
translated: Things do not arise because of the existence of a purpose,

original: dngos po ni rgyu tsam la rag las pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po ni rgyu tsam la rag las pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because things depend merely on causes.

original: 'on te snga ma las gzhan pa'i rang bzhin 'dzin pa yin na /
analyzed: 'on te snga ma las gzhan pa'i rang bzhin 'dzin pa yin na /
translated: But if it apprehends a nature that is different from the previous one,

original: de lta na ni 'di yid kyi mngon sum gyi rang bzhin gyi shes pa gzhan nyid do //
analyzed: de lta na ni 'di yid kyi mngon sum gyi rang bzhin gyi shes pa gzhan nyid do //
translated: then it is a different kind of mental direct perception.

original: de ltar yang ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar yang ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: It would be taught in that way.

original: 'on te spyi nyid de ltar 'dzin pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'on te spyi nyid de ltar 'dzin pa yin gyi /
translated: But if it apprehends a universal in that way,

original: sngar ma mthong ba'i khyad par ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: sngar ma mthong ba'i khyad par ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But it is not a special kind of apprehension not previously seen.

original: de lta na ni 'o na spyi tsam 'dzin pa yin na ni /
analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na spyi tsam 'dzin pa yin na ni /
translated: If that is so, then if it apprehends a mere universal,

original: khyad par la ltos mi rung ngo //
analyzed: khyad par la ltos mi rung ngo //
translated: it should not depend on a particular.

original: gal te mig la sogs pa dag gis spyi 'dzin pa nyid yin na /
analyzed: gal te mig la sogs pa dag gis spyi 'dzin pa nyid yin na /
translated: If the eye and so on apprehend a universal,

original: de'i tshe khyad par 'dzin pa gzhan med pa'i phyir spyi 'dzin pa na khyad par 'dzin pa la ltos par mi 'gyur na 'gyur ba yang yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe khyad par 'dzin pa gzhan med pa'i phyir spyi 'dzin pa na khyad par 'dzin pa la ltos par mi 'gyur na 'gyur ba yang yin no //
translated: then at that time, since there is no other apprehension of a particular, the apprehension of a universal should not depend on the apprehension of a particular, but it does.

original: 'di ltar ba lang ngo zhes spyi bzung ba na /
analyzed: 'di ltar ba lang ngo zhes spyi bzung ba na /
translated: Thus, when a universal is apprehended, saying ‚ÄúThis is a cow,‚Äù

original: ba lang ji lta bu zhig ces rtogs pa ni 'jig rten na mthong ba yin no //üîΩde'i phyir mig dang gzugs dag la //
analyzed: ba lang ji lta bu zhig ces rtogs pa ni 'jig rten na mthong ba yin no // de'i phyir mig dang gzugs dag la //
translated: in the world it is seen that one wonders, ‚ÄúWhat kind of cow is it?‚ÄùüîΩTherefore:

original: brten nas mig blo skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: brten nas mig blo skye bar 'gyur //
translated: The eye consciousness arises in dependence on the eye and form.

original: de la dran pa mkho ba med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de la dran pa mkho ba med pa'i phyir /
translated: Since memory is not necessary for that,

original: mig gi blo ni mig dang gzugs tsam kho na las skye ba yin no //
analyzed: mig gi blo ni mig dang gzugs tsam kho na las skye ba yin no //
translated: the eye consciousness arises from the eye and form alone.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / mig ni mdun na gnas pa yi //
analyzed: 'di ltar / mig ni mdun na gnas pa yi //
translated: The eye is known to engage

original: gzugs tsam la ni 'jug par rtogs //
analyzed: gzugs tsam la ni 'jug par rtogs //
translated: just the form that is present before it.

original: gzhan du rtogs par 'gyur ba yi //
analyzed: gzhan du rtogs par 'gyur ba yi //
translated: And it is not otherwise that it is realized.üîΩ

original: byed pa gzhan du ji ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: byed pa gzhan du ji ltar 'gyur //
translated: How can the cognition of one thing be the cognition of another?

original: gzhan du rtogs pa ni gzhan du rtogs par mi nus so //üîΩmdun na gnas pa'i gzugs tsam la 'jug par mthong ba'i mig ni /
analyzed: gzhan du rtogs pa ni gzhan du rtogs par mi nus so // mdun na gnas pa'i gzugs tsam la 'jug par mthong ba'i mig ni /
translated: The cognition of one thing cannot be the cognition of another.

original: sgra dang spyi la sogs pa 'jug pa yin no zhes brjod par mi nus te /
analyzed: sgra dang spyi la sogs pa 'jug pa yin no zhes brjod par mi nus te /
translated: One cannot say that the eye, which is seen to engage only the form that is present before it, engages sound, universals, etc.

original: tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no valid cognition for that.

original: de ltar rtogs pa yin na ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar rtogs pa yin na ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If there were, it would follow, absurdly, that everything would be cognized simultaneously.üîΩTherefore,

original: de'i phyir / dran pa'i 'og rol dus su'am //üîΩdran pa las ni sngar yang rung //
analyzed: de'i phyir / dran pa'i 'og rol dus su'am // dran pa las ni sngar yang rung //
translated: Either after the memory or even before it,

original: mngon sum rnam rtog ma yin te //
analyzed: mngon sum rnam rtog ma yin te //
translated: The perception is nonconceptual,

original: yul tha dad pa nyid phyir ro //üîΩdran pa las dus phyis 'di ni dri zhim pa'o //
analyzed: yul tha dad pa nyid phyir ro // dran pa las dus phyis 'di ni dri zhim pa'o //
translated: Because the objects are different.

original: 'di ni dri mi zhim pa'o snyam pa la sogs pa'i shes pa ni mngon sum ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni dri mi zhim pa'o snyam pa la sogs pa'i shes pa ni mngon sum ma yin te /
translated: The cognition that arises after the memory, such as the cognition that thinks, This is a pleasant smell, this is an unpleasant smell, etc., is not a perception.

original: mig gi shes pa'i byed pa ni gzugs tsam ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mig gi shes pa'i byed pa ni gzugs tsam ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the function of the eye consciousness is not to engage smells.

original: de'i phyir mig la sogs pa la brten nas don rnams la skye ba can gang yin pa de kho na mngon sum yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir mig la sogs pa la brten nas don rnams la skye ba can gang yin pa de kho na mngon sum yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, that which arises in regard to objects in dependence on the eye, etc. is perception, and nothing else.

original: des na sgra dang spyi la sogs pa'i rnam pa can ni mngon sum nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: des na sgra dang spyi la sogs pa'i rnam pa can ni mngon sum nyid ma yin no //
translated: Thus, that which has the aspect of sound, universals, etc. is not perception.

original: gang zhig gsal bar snang ba'i rgyu mtshan gzhan la brten pa de yang gzung bar bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig gsal bar snang ba'i rgyu mtshan gzhan la brten pa de yang gzung bar bya ba ma yin no //
translated: That which is based on another as the cause of the appearance of clarity is also not an object of perception.

original: des na yid la sogs pa de yang mngon sum yin no //
analyzed: des na yid la sogs pa de yang mngon sum yin no //
translated: Therefore, the mental faculty, etc. are also perception.

original: yang na don gyi rang bzhin la 'jug cing khyab par byed pas na de yang dbang po nyid yin no //üîΩgal te ci'i phyir gnyi @257a * //
analyzed: yang na don gyi rang bzhin la 'jug cing khyab par byed pas na de yang dbang po nyid yin no // gal te ci'i phyir gnyi @257a * //
translated: Or, it is a sense faculty because it engages and pervades the nature of an object.

original: ga la rag las nas skyes pa la dbang po la brten par brjod kyi yul la brten par ma yin gzugs la sogs pa'i yul gyi sgo nas tha snyad du bya ba'i rigs kyi /
analyzed: ga la rag las nas skyes pa la dbang po la brten par brjod kyi yul la brten par ma yin gzugs la sogs pa'i yul gyi sgo nas tha snyad du bya ba'i rigs kyi /
translated: Why is that which arises in dependence on both called based on a sense faculty and not based on an object? It is reasonable to designate it as an object of form, etc.,

original: dbang po'i sgo nas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dbang po'i sgo nas ni ma yin no //
translated: but not as a sense faculty.

original: dbang po las skyes pa tsam nyid kyis ni mngon sum du 'gyur ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: dbang po las skyes pa tsam nyid kyis ni mngon sum du 'gyur ba ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not the case that mere arising from a sense faculty is perception.

original: yul gyi rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pas 'jug pa ni thams cad mngon sum kho na'o //
analyzed: yul gyi rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pas 'jug pa ni thams cad mngon sum kho na'o //
translated: All [sense consciousnesses] are perception because they engage their objects by way of grasping the nature of the object.

original: dbang po la brten pa ni 'ga' zhig mngon sum yin la gzhan ni gzhan du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbang po la brten pa ni 'ga' zhig mngon sum yin la gzhan ni gzhan du 'gyur ro //

original: 'khrul pa med pa'i rgyu mtshan des ni de la tha snyad byed par 'thad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'khrul pa med pa'i rgyu mtshan des ni de la tha snyad byed par 'thad pa yin no //
translated: It is reasonable to use the term perception for that which is nondeceptive.

original: yul gyis bskyed pa yin yang zla ba gnyis la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can 'khrul pa nyid ma yin nam ;
analyzed: yul gyis bskyed pa yin yang zla ba gnyis la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can 'khrul pa nyid ma yin nam ;
translated: But isn‚Äôt the nature of the consciousness that arises from an object such as the two moons deceptive?

original: des na yul las skyes pa yang thams cad la ma 'khrul pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na yul las skyes pa yang thams cad la ma 'khrul pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, even though it arises from an object, it is not nondeceptive in all ways.

original: de ni yul nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni yul nyid ma yin te /
translated: That is not an object.

original: de ni rnam par gtod par nus pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rnam par gtod par nus pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is a cause that is able to project the consciousness.

original: 'o na ni de lta na /üîΩde ni dbang po nyid ma yin te des na yul las nyams pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'o na ni de lta na / de ni dbang po nyid ma yin te des na yul las nyams pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Well then,üîΩit is not a sense faculty because it does not contact its object.

original: dbang po ni nyams pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po ni nyams pa'i phyir ro //

original: dbang po ni nyams pa yin la de ni dbang po ltar snang ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: dbang po ni nyams pa yin la de ni dbang po ltar snang ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the sense faculty is impaired and that what appears as a sense faculty is not a sense faculty,

original: de lta na ni 'o na /
analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na /
translated: then in that case,

original: gal te dngos su shes skyed la //
analyzed: gal te dngos su shes skyed la //
translated: if it generates cognition directly,

original: dbang po bzhin du yul nus yin //üîΩ'o na ci phyir gnyis rag las //
analyzed: dbang po bzhin du yul nus yin // 'o na ci phyir gnyis rag las //
translated: then the object is able to generate cognition, just like the sense faculty.

original: skye ba de ni des mi brjod //
analyzed: skye ba de ni des mi brjod //

original: yul dang dbang po dag rgyu nyid du mtshungs pa yin na /
analyzed: yul dang dbang po dag rgyu nyid du mtshungs pa yin na /

original: ci'i phyir yul gyi sgo nas tha snyad du mi byed /
analyzed: ci'i phyir yul gyi sgo nas tha snyad du mi byed /
translated: why is a convention not made from the perspective of the object?

original: rtog pa sngon du gtong ba dag ni ci rung bar tha snyad byed pa'am spong ba ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rtog pa sngon du gtong ba dag ni ci rung bar tha snyad byed pa'am spong ba ma yin no zhe na /

original: 'di la bshad pa /
analyzed: 'di la bshad pa /

original: go bar byed pa nyid mthong nas //üîΩtha snyad nges par sbyar ba yin //
analyzed: go bar byed pa nyid mthong nas // tha snyad nges par sbyar ba yin //
translated: Having seen that it is the conveyor of understanding,üîΩthe convention is applied.

original: dbang po'i tha snyad la de yod //
analyzed: dbang po'i tha snyad la de yod //

original: sbyar bar bya ba'ang de chos yin //
analyzed: sbyar bar bya ba'ang de chos yin //

analyzed: go bar byed pa dang / go bar byed pa ma yin pa nyid kyis len pa dang 'dor ba yin no //

original: go bar byed pa nyid kyang dbang po'i tha snyad la yod de /
analyzed: go bar byed pa nyid kyang dbang po'i tha snyad la yod de /
translated: The term ‚Äúsense-perception‚Äù is also used in the sense of the sense-faculty.

original: gang dbang po la brten pa de ni mngon sum yin no //
analyzed: gang dbang po la brten pa de ni mngon sum yin no //

original: nyams pas 'khrul pa yang sngar spang zin to //
analyzed: nyams pas 'khrul pa yang sngar spang zin to //

original: 'o na ni yul dang yang 'khrul pa med de /
analyzed: 'o na ni yul dang yang 'khrul pa med de /

original: de ni yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de ni yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because it is not the object.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.

original: gal te de ni yul yin na //
analyzed: gal te de ni yul yin na //
translated: If it is the object,

original: gzhan gyi mngon sum ji ltar 'gyur //üîΩdbang po nyid ni gcig nyid la //
analyzed: gzhan gyi mngon sum ji ltar 'gyur // dbang po nyid ni gcig nyid la //

original: yod dang med pa'i khyad par min //
analyzed: yod dang med pa'i khyad par min //
translated: The sense-faculty itself is not the difference between existence and non-existence.

original: de nyid kyi phyir thun mong ma yin pa'i sgo nas tha snyad du byed pa ni mthong ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir thun mong ma yin pa'i sgo nas tha snyad du byed pa ni mthong ste /
translated: Therefore, it is seen that the sense-perception is conventionally designated as non-common.

original: rnga bo che'i sgra dang nas kyi myu gu zhes bya ba lta bu'o zhes bshad do //
analyzed: rnga bo che'i sgra dang nas kyi myu gu zhes bya ba lta bu'o zhes bshad do //

original: nas kyi myu gu zhes brjod na /
analyzed: nas kyi myu gu zhes brjod na /
translated: When it is said ‚Äúthe sprout of barley,‚Äù

original: nas ma yin pa'i myu gu rtogs par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: nas ma yin pa'i myu gu rtogs par mi 'gyur /
translated: it is not understood that the sprout is not barley.

original: sa'i myu gu zhes bya ba ni de yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sa'i myu gu zhes bya ba ni de yang 'gyur ro //
translated: It is also said ‚Äúthe sprout of the earth.‚Äù

original: 'dir @257b yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: 'dir @257b yang de bzhin no //
translated: Here it is the same.

original: 'on te yul la brten pa'i zhes bya ba ni yul gyi rang bzhin 'dzin pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te yul la brten pa'i zhes bya ba ni yul gyi rang bzhin 'dzin pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Or, if you say that it is based on the object, then it is the nature of the object that is apprehended.

original: de lta yin na rang rig pa kho na mngon sum du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta yin na rang rig pa kho na mngon sum du 'gyur te /
translated: If that is so, then it is only autocognition that is direct perception,

original: gzhan du go bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du go bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: because it is not understood otherwise.

original: ci ste 'jig rten na rab tu grags pa'i yul gyi rang bzhin rtogs pa brjod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste 'jig rten na rab tu grags pa'i yul gyi rang bzhin rtogs pa brjod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that it is the understanding of the nature of the object that is well known in the world,

original: de lta na dbang po la brten pa zhes 'jig rten na grags pas 'di nyid du 'gyur mod /
analyzed: de lta na dbang po la brten pa zhes 'jig rten na grags pas 'di nyid du 'gyur mod /
translated: then it is indeed just that, because it is well known in the world as based on the sense faculties.

original: tha snyad gzhan yongs su brtags pas ci zhig bye brag tu smra ba la sogs pa'i gzhung ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang mngon sum du 'gyur te /
analyzed: tha snyad gzhan yongs su brtags pas ci zhig bye brag tu smra ba la sogs pa'i gzhung ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang mngon sum du 'gyur te /
translated: But according to the VaibhƒÅ·π£ika and so on, mental consciousness would be direct perception,

original: yul 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it apprehends objects.

original: de'i dbang po'i tha snyad nyid 'thad do //
analyzed: de'i dbang po'i tha snyad nyid 'thad do //
translated: It is tenable that it is called a sense faculty.

original: de skad du yang yul ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang rgyud gzhan dag gi rnam par shes pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir thun mong yin no zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de skad du yang yul ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang rgyud gzhan dag gi rnam par shes pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir thun mong yin no zhes bshad do //

original: de'i phyir dbang po'i tha snyad kyis mngon sum gyi rang bzhin rtog pa dang bral ba mtshon par nus kyi yul gyi tha snyad kyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir dbang po'i tha snyad kyis mngon sum gyi rang bzhin rtog pa dang bral ba mtshon par nus kyi yul gyi tha snyad kyis ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the term ‚Äúsense-faculty‚Äù can indicate the nature of perception, which is free from conceptualization, but the term ‚Äúobject‚Äù cannot.

original: yul gyis kyang mtshon par nus pa ma yin nam /üîΩ'di ltar don gyi mthu las ni //
analyzed: yul gyis kyang mtshon par nus pa ma yin nam / 'di ltar don gyi mthu las ni //
translated: But can‚Äôt the object also indicate?üîΩIt is said:

original: yang dag skye ba yin phyir ro //
analyzed: yang dag skye ba yin phyir ro //
translated: Because it arises from the power of the object,üîΩit is the nature of that.

original: de ni don gyi mthu las skye ba na de'i rang bzhin kho na'i rjes su byed do zhes bshad pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de ni don gyi mthu las skye ba na de'i rang bzhin kho na'i rjes su byed do zhes bshad pa yin no zhe na /
translated: When it arises from the power of the object, it is said to conform to the nature of that object.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it cannot,

original: ma nges pa'i phyir te zla ba gnyis kyi rnam pa can nyid kyis 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma nges pa'i phyir te zla ba gnyis kyi rnam pa can nyid kyis 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is uncertain. It is mistaken, for example, in the case of the appearance of two moons.

original: 'on te don gyi mthu las 'khrul pa mi skyed do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te don gyi mthu las 'khrul pa mi skyed do zhe na /
translated: But if it does not arise from the power of the object, it is mistaken.

original: de lta yin na de rigs pa 'dis rtog pa med pa nyid du ma grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta yin na de rigs pa 'dis rtog pa med pa nyid du ma grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were so, then this type of cognition would not be established as non-conceptual.

original: de'i phyir 'dir ni dbang po'i nyid la don du tha snyad byas pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir ni dbang po'i nyid la don du tha snyad byas pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, here the sense faculty is taken as the object.

original: don du mngon par zhen pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don du mngon par zhen pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the attachment to the object.

original: de lta bu nyid kyi dbang po ni go bar byed pa shin tu yin pa'i phyir de nyid kyis tha snyad du byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu nyid kyi dbang po ni go bar byed pa shin tu yin pa'i phyir de nyid kyis tha snyad du byas pa yin no //
translated: The sense faculty of that type is the best indicator, so it is taken as the basis for the convention.

original: de'i phyir tha snyad 'di la ni //üîΩsbyar bya rang bzhin rtag yin te //
analyzed: de'i phyir tha snyad 'di la ni // sbyar bya rang bzhin rtag yin te //
translated: Therefore, in this convention,üîΩThe object of application is the permanent nature.

original: khyab par byed pa'i rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: khyab par byed pa'i rang bzhin ni //
translated: Because the pervading nature

original: log pa'i phyir na ldog par 'gyur //
analyzed: log pa'i phyir na ldog par 'gyur //

original: rtog pa'i sngon du gtong ba'i sbyar ba nyid go bar byed pa yin no zhes brjod de /
analyzed: rtog pa'i sngon du gtong ba'i sbyar ba nyid go bar byed pa yin no zhes brjod de /

original: de'i phyir de nyid go bar byed pa'i rtags yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de nyid go bar byed pa'i rtags yin no //
translated: Therefore, that itself is the reason for understanding.

original: gal te rtog pa sngon du gtong bas byas par cis shes she na /
analyzed: gal te rtog pa sngon du gtong bas byas par cis shes she na /
translated: If it is asked how it is known that it is made by conceptualization preceding,

original: de ni bden te /
analyzed: de ni bden te /
translated: that is true.

original: skyes bu tshad ma yin pas tshig tshad mar rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: skyes bu tshad ma yin pas tshig tshad mar rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: But it is not that the word is valid because the person is valid.

original: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du de skad brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du de skad brjod pa yin no //
translated: This is said in terms of worldly convention.

original: don dam par ni gang gis khyab par byed pa'i rang bzhin log pas ldog par brjod pa rtags nyid la khyab ba brjod pa ni ma yin no //üîΩgal te yul la brten pa zhes bya ba'i tha snyad ni 'jig rten na grags pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i go bar @258a * //
analyzed: don dam par ni gang gis khyab par byed pa'i rang bzhin log pas ldog par brjod pa rtags nyid la khyab ba brjod pa ni ma yin no // gal te yul la brten pa zhes bya ba'i tha snyad ni 'jig rten na grags pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i go bar @258a * //
translated: In the ultimate sense, the word is not said to pervade because the nature of the pervader is reversed.

original: byed pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: byed pa ma yin nam /
translated: If you say that the expression ‚Äúbased on the object‚Äù is not a conceptual cognition that is known in the world,

original: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i mngon sum gyi yul ni snga ma dang phyi mar gyur pa gcig nyid yin no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i mngon sum gyi yul ni snga ma dang phyi mar gyur pa gcig nyid yin no //
translated: then the object of conceptual cognition is the same in the past and the future.

original: 'di ni 'jig rten na mngon sum zhes rab tu grags pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni 'jig rten na mngon sum zhes rab tu grags pa yin te /
translated: This is well known in the world as perception.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / gang zhig bdag gis mthong ba de //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gang zhig bdag gis mthong ba de //
translated: That which I see

original: mngon sum gyis ni rtogs 'di nyid //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis ni rtogs 'di nyid //
translated: is understood by perception.

original: sgra don thams cad 'jig rten gyi //
analyzed: sgra don thams cad 'jig rten gyi //
translated: All the meanings of words

original: grags pas rtogs par byas pa yin //
analyzed: grags pas rtogs par byas pa yin //
translated: are understood by what is known in the world.

original: gnod pa med pa'i rtogs pa la //
analyzed: gnod pa med pa'i rtogs pa la //
translated: The conventional usage of ‚Äúvalid cognition‚Äù

original: tshad ma'i tha snyad brten pa yin //üîΩtshad ma yis ni grub 'gyur pa //
analyzed: tshad ma'i tha snyad brten pa yin // tshad ma yis ni grub 'gyur pa //
translated: is based on non-defective awareness.üîΩHow can one establish something

original: gzhan du bya bar ji ltar nus //
analyzed: gzhan du bya bar ji ltar nus //
translated: by means of something that is not established?

original: da ni mi bden te /üîΩ'dir ni mngon du byed pa nyid //
analyzed: da ni mi bden te / 'dir ni mngon du byed pa nyid //
translated: Now, it is not true thatüîΩit is not a means of valid cognition.

original: mngon sum don rtogs can yin la /üîΩmngon du byed pa las gzhan la //
analyzed: mngon sum don rtogs can yin la / mngon du byed pa las gzhan la //
translated: For it is the direct perception of the object,üîΩand apart from direct perception,

original: rjes dpag ma gtogs tshad gzhan med //
analyzed: rjes dpag ma gtogs tshad gzhan med //
translated: there is no other means of valid cognition except inference.

original: mngon sum du byed pa'i rnam pa can ma yin pa la ni rjes su dpag pa nyid gcig pu zhig tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum du byed pa'i rnam pa can ma yin pa la ni rjes su dpag pa nyid gcig pu zhig tshad ma yin no //
translated: In the case of what is not of the nature of direct perception, inference alone is the means of valid cognition.

analyzed: des na gal te ngo shes pa'i tshad ma mngon du byed pa'i rnam pas mi 'jug na ni /
translated: Therefore, if the means of valid cognition of recognition does not operate by the mode of direct perception,

original: de'i phyir rjes su dpag pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rjes su dpag pa kho na'o //
translated: then it is inference alone.

original: mngon du byed na mdun na gnas pa'i dngos po tsam la 'jug pa'i phyir ngo shes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon du byed na mdun na gnas pa'i dngos po tsam la 'jug pa'i phyir ngo shes pa ma yin no //
translated: If it is direct perception, then it is not recognition, because it operates with regard to the mere thing that is present before one.

original: des na mngon du byed pa ni dbang po'i tha snyad kho nas rtogs par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: des na mngon du byed pa ni dbang po'i tha snyad kho nas rtogs par 'gyur gyi /

analyzed: gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //

analyzed: yul gyi tha snyad kyis ni yul dang bcas pa zhes bya bar 'gyur gyi /

analyzed: mngon du byed pa nyid du ni brjod par mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de ltar tha snyad bya ba la ni 'jig rten na mngon sum du ma grags so //

original: mngon sum ni tshad ma nyid kyang yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum ni tshad ma nyid kyang yin no //
translated: Perception is a means of valid knowledge.

original: mngon du byed pa las ma gtogs par mngon sum nyid kyang rigs pa med pa'i phyir na mngon sum rtog pa med par 'grub bo //
analyzed: mngon du byed pa las ma gtogs par mngon sum nyid kyang rigs pa med pa'i phyir na mngon sum rtog pa med par 'grub bo //
translated: And since it is not possible for perception to be a means of valid knowledge except through the act of perceiving, perception is established as being nonconceptual.

original: 'o na ji ltar 'di skad ces //
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar 'di skad ces //
translated: But how is it that the following is said:

original: der don mang pos bskyed pa'i phyir //
analyzed: der don mang pos bskyed pa'i phyir //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause it is produced by many objects,

original: rang gi don la spyi yul can //
analyzed: rang gi don la spyi yul can //
translated: it has a universal for its object.‚Äù

original: zhes gsungs / spyi'i yul can ni rnam par rtog pa med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs / spyi'i yul can ni rnam par rtog pa med pa ma yin te /
translated: An awareness that has a universal for its object is not nonconceptual,

analyzed: spyir rnam par rtog pa nyid kyis de dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is in general contradictory for it to be both conceptual and nonconceptual.

original: de nyid smras pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid smras pa ni /
translated: This is what he says:

analyzed: bsags pa dag ni tshogs pa yin // de spyi de la dbang po'i blo //
translated: An aggregation is a collection.üîΩThe awareness of that universal

original: spyi blo gdon mi za bar yang //
analyzed: spyi blo gdon mi za bar yang //
translated: is certainly not a conceptual awareness.

original: rnam par rtog dang rjes su 'brel//
analyzed: rnam par rtog dang rjes su 'brel//
translated: And it is related to conceptualization.

original: mang po rang bzhin phan tshun spangs te gnas pa rnams de kho na ltar gzung na spyi'i blor 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: mang po rang bzhin phan tshun spangs te gnas pa rnams de kho na ltar gzung na spyi'i blor 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: When many things that are mutually exclusive by nature are apprehended in that way, they do not become the object of a cognition of a universal.

original: tshogs pa don dam pa pa'am btags pa yin na /
analyzed: tshogs pa don dam pa pa'am btags pa yin na /
translated: Is the ultimate collection a real entity or a nominal entity?

original: de la re zhig dom dam pa pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de la re zhig dom dam pa pa ni ma yin te /
translated: First, it is not a real entity,

original: de las tha dad par rtogs pa snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las tha dad par rtogs pa snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not perceived as separate from them.
